dehghani2017tacit.title: TACIT: An open-source text analysis, crawling, and interpretation tool
dehghani2017tacit.author: Dehghani, Morteza and Johnson, Kate M and Garten, Justin and Boghrati, Reihane and Hoover, Joe and Balasubramanian, Vijayan and Singh, Anurag and Shankar, Yuvarani and Pulickal, Linda and Rajkumar, Aswin and others
dehghani2017tacit.paperMotivationText: Online communication as a source for investigating psychological and social processes
dehghani2017tacit.paperContributionText: Text Analysis, Crawling, and Interpretation Tool (TACIT) to facilitate the analysis of large data from the web, using SotA text analysis techniques
dehghani2017tacit.paperResultsText: Data exploration showcased the usefulness of the tool
dehghani2017tacit.dataOtherText: Crawlers for political and legal data, historical text, and stackexchange
dehghani2017tacit.dataDomainOtherText: Tool can be used for data from any topic domain
dehghani2017tacit.dataYesCommentText: Tool has a ready-to-use crawler for this URL
